嵏字的基本解释

嵏
zōng
〔九嵏山〕山名，中国陕西、湖北等省均有此山名。
数峰并峙的山：“夷嵏筑堂，垒台增成。”

嵏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zōng］
［《廣韻》子紅切，平東，精。］
亦作“嵕1”。
数峰并峙的山。

嵏字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嵏； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页316第22
【唐韻】子紅切【集韻】【韻會】祖叢切，?音騣。九嵏，山名，在馮翊谷口。【前漢·地理志註】在醴泉界。【班固·西都賦】前乘秦嶺，後越九嵏。　又【范雍詩】山奇號九嵏，見孝感縣志，亦名九宗山。郡國志作嵕。　又峰聚之山曰嵏。【揚雄·校獵賦】虎路三嵏。【註】路音落。服虔曰：以竹虎落此山也。今醴泉、屯留二縣，有三嵏山，言三峰聚也。【司馬相如·上林賦】凌三嵏之危。　【正字通】俗譌作嵕。

嵏字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
嵏字的起名意思

暂无。

嵏
Basic explanation of words
嵏
zōng
[Jiushan Mountain] The name of the mountain, Shaanxi, Hubei and other provinces of China have this mountain name.
A mountain with several peaks: "The barbarian builds a hall, and the basement increases."
嵏
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zōng］
["Guangyun" sub-red cut, flat east, fine. ]
Also known as "嵕1".
A mountain with several peaks facing each other.
嵏
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嵏; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 316 22
[Tang Yun] Zihong cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ancestral Cong cut,? Yin Xie. Jiusheng, the name of the mountain, is at Fengyi Gukou. [Annotation to Geography of the Former Han Dynasty] In Liquanjie. [Ban Gu·Xi Du Fu] Ride the Qinling Mountains in the front, and cross the Jiucheng in the back.　[Fan Yongshi] The odd mountain name is Jiuwei, see Xiaogan County Chronicles, also known as Jiuzong Mountain. The history of the county and the country is made up.　The mountain where the peak gathers is called 嵏. [Yang Xiong·School Hunting Fu] Tiger Road Sanguo. [Note] Lu Yinluo. Fu Qian said: Take the bamboo tiger down this mountain. Today, there are two counties in Liquan and Tunliu, and there are three mountains, and three peaks are gathered together. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】The danger of Ling Sanwei.　【Zhengzitong】The popular 譌作嵕.
嵏

Name meaning

a mountain in Shenxi
